meanings.definition: To make or receive a telephone call.
meanings.sent1: She telephoned her friend to chat about their day.
meanings.sent2: He telephoned his mom to say goodnight.
meanings.sent3: The cat telephoned the dog for a playdate.
meanings.sent4: The stars telephoned each other across the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The flowers telephoned the bees to come and pollinate them.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, she telephoned her sister to catch up.
meanings.sent2: He telephoned his boss after the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The cake telephoned the ice cream for a sweet reunion.
meanings.sent4: The sun telephoned the moon to share the news of the day.
meanings.sent5: The waves telephoned the shore, whispering secrets of the sea.
